channel.title: 3 Problems in my 508
channel.description:
I have global objects created and they do not show up until an admin or mod types the ::object command. Is there something I can add to the player.java or frames.java to make it refresh the area when a person enters it? Such as loading the objects?
ALSO
I have a problem with trading, after a trade all of the tabs are gone (ex. inventory, prayer, stats) and the player has to type ::players or use a bank to make them appear again.
AND FINALLY
I can't seem to figure out how to make the shops sell "x" items it will only sell 1 at a time.
hopefully someone could give me some advice on any of these issues? Thanks ^-^
